sql.where: 1=1 AND user.user_id = #{userId} AND user.user_telephone = #{userTelephone} AND user.user_password = #{userPassword} AND user.user_salt = #{userSalt} AND user.user_open_platform = #{userOpen_platform} AND user.user_platform_openid = #{userPlatform_openid} AND user.user_platform_lcopenid = #{userPlatform_lcopenid} AND user.user_platform_unionid = #{userPlatform_unionid} AND user.user_nickname = #{userNickname} AND user.user_avatar = #{userAvatar} AND user.user_email = #{userEmail} AND user.user_realname = #{userRealname} AND user.user_cert_no = #{userCert_no} AND user.user_cert_type = #{userCert_type} AND user.user_identification_status = #{userIdentification_status} AND user.user_pay_password = #{userPay_password} AND user.user_pay_salt = #{userPay_salt} AND user.user_bank_code = #{userBank_code} AND user.user_bank_account = #{userBank_account} AND user.user_bank_account_owner_name = #{userBank_account_owner_name} AND user.user_bank_telephone = #{userBank_telephone} AND user.user_card_type = #{userCard_type} AND user.user_card_attribute = #{userCard_attribute} AND user.user_bank_province = #{userBank_province} AND user.user_bank_city = #{userBank_city} AND user.user_bank_branch = #{userBank_branch} AND user.user_bank_status = #{userBank_status} AND user.user_sina_card_id = #{userSina_card_id} AND user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket = #{userSina_bind_card_ticket} AND user.user_register_ip = #{userRegister_ip} AND user.user_register_time = #{userRegister_time} AND user.user_first_login = #{userFirst_login} AND user.user_yield_report = #{userYield_report} AND user.user_status = #{userStatus} AND user.user_createtime = #{userCreatetime} AND user.user_modifytime = #{userModifytime}

1=1 AND user_id = #{userId} AND user_telephone = #{userTelephone} AND user_password = #{userPassword} AND user_salt = #{userSalt} AND user_open_platform = #{userOpen_platform} AND user_platform_openid = #{userPlatform_openid} AND user_platform_lcopenid = #{userPlatform_lcopenid} AND user_platform_unionid = #{userPlatform_unionid} AND user_nickname = #{userNickname} AND user_avatar = #{userAvatar} AND user_email = #{userEmail} AND user_realname = #{userRealname} AND user_cert_no = #{userCert_no} AND user_cert_type = #{userCert_type} AND user_identification_status = #{userIdentification_status} AND user_pay_password = #{userPay_password} AND user_pay_salt = #{userPay_salt} AND user_bank_code = #{userBank_code} AND user_bank_account = #{userBank_account} AND user_bank_account_owner_name = #{userBank_account_owner_name} AND user_bank_telephone = #{userBank_telephone} AND user_card_type = #{userCard_type} AND user_card_attribute = #{userCard_attribute} AND user_bank_province = #{userBank_province} AND user_bank_city = #{userBank_city} AND user_bank_branch = #{userBank_branch} AND user_bank_status = #{userBank_status} AND user_sina_card_id = #{userSina_card_id} AND user_sina_bind_card_ticket = #{userSina_bind_card_ticket} AND user_register_ip = #{userRegister_ip} AND user_register_time = #{userRegister_time} AND user_first_login = #{userFirst_login} AND user_yield_report = #{userYield_report} AND user_status = #{userStatus} AND user_createtime = #{userCreatetime} AND user_modifytime = #{userModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_user AS user

SELECT user.user_id as userId, user.user_telephone as userTelephone, user.user_password as userPassword, user.user_salt as userSalt, user.user_open_platform as userOpen_platform, user.user_platform_openid as userPlatform_openid, user.user_platform_lcopenid as userPlatform_lcopenid, user.user_platform_unionid as userPlatform_unionid, user.user_nickname as userNickname, user.user_avatar as userAvatar, user.user_email as userEmail, user.user_realname as userRealname, user.user_cert_no as userCert_no, user.user_cert_type as userCert_type, user.user_identification_status as userIdentification_status, user.user_pay_password as userPay_password, user.user_pay_salt as userPay_salt, user.user_bank_code as userBank_code, user.user_bank_account as userBank_account, user.user_bank_account_owner_name as userBank_account_owner_name, user.user_bank_telephone as userBank_telephone, user.user_card_type as userCard_type, user.user_card_attribute as userCard_attribute, user.user_bank_province as userBank_province, user.user_bank_city as userBank_city, user.user_bank_branch as userBank_branch, user.user_bank_status as userBank_status, user.user_sina_card_id as userSina_card_id, user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket as userSina_bind_card_ticket, user.user_register_ip as userRegister_ip, user.user_register_time as userRegister_time, user.user_first_login as userFirst_login, user.user_yield_report as userYield_report, user.user_status as userStatus, user.user_createtime as userCreatetime, user.user_modifytime as userModifytime FROM dr_user AS user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user.user_id as userId, user.user_telephone as userTelephone, user.user_password as userPassword, user.user_salt as userSalt, user.user_open_platform as userOpen_platform, user.user_platform_openid as userPlatform_openid, user.user_platform_lcopenid as userPlatform_lcopenid, user.user_platform_unionid as userPlatform_unionid, user.user_nickname as userNickname, user.user_avatar as userAvatar, user.user_email as userEmail, user.user_realname as userRealname, user.user_cert_no as userCert_no, user.user_cert_type as userCert_type, user.user_identification_status as userIdentification_status, user.user_pay_password as userPay_password, user.user_pay_salt as userPay_salt, user.user_bank_code as userBank_code, user.user_bank_account as userBank_account, user.user_bank_account_owner_name as userBank_account_owner_name, user.user_bank_telephone as userBank_telephone, user.user_card_type as userCard_type, user.user_card_attribute as userCard_attribute, user.user_bank_province as userBank_province, user.user_bank_city as userBank_city, user.user_bank_branch as userBank_branch, user.user_bank_status as userBank_status, user.user_sina_card_id as userSina_card_id, user.user_sina_bind_card_ticket as userSina_bind_card_ticket, user.user_register_ip as userRegister_ip, user.user_register_time as userRegister_time, user.user_first_login as userFirst_login, user.user_yield_report as userYield_report, user.user_status as userStatus, user.user_createtime as userCreatetime, user.user_modifytime as userModifytime FROM dr_user AS user
${orderby}
